review_data.title: Gelato
review_data.content: Il miglior gelato che abbia assaggiato.Qualita e servizio eccellente.Una grande variada de tipi de gelato.

review_data.title: Werbung in Briefkasten obwohl steht: "Bitte keine Werbung"
review_data.content: Als ich den Werbeboten darauf ansprach, entgegnete er mir, dass er kein deutsch spreche und lesen kann. Ich probierte es...More

review_data.title: (almost) like in Italy
review_data.content: Even though ice cream shops in Italy usually have a larger selection and are a bit cheaper, which, however, was to be expected bearing Swiss prices in mind, this shop is a real treat. You can indulge your sweet tooth with traditional flavours, but also...More
